as.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwrite by asChild
as.description_zh: 此组件应呈现为的元素或组件。可以被 asChild 覆盖

asChild.description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.
asChild.description_zh: 更改作为子元素传递的默认渲染元素，合并其道具和行为。

disableOutsidePointerEvents.description: When true, hover/focus/click interactions will be disabled on elements outside the bounds of the component. Users will need to click twice on outside elements to interact with them: Once to close the navigation menu, and again to activate the element.
disableOutsidePointerEvents.description_zh: 如果为 true，则将在组件边界之外的元素上禁用悬停/聚焦/单击交互。用户需要单击两次外部元素才能与它们交互：一次关闭导航菜单，另一次激活元素。

forceMount.description: Used to force mounting when more control is needed. Useful when controlling animation with Vue.js animation libraries.
forceMount.description_zh: 用于在需要更多控制时强制安装。在使用 Vue.js 动画库控制动画时很有用。

events.name: escapeKeyDown
events.description: Event handler called when the escape key is down. It can be prevented by calling event.preventDefault.
events.description_zh: 当转义键关闭时调用的事件处理程序。可以通过调用 event.preventDefault 来防止它。

events.name: pointerDownOutside
events.description: Event handler called when a pointer event occurs outside the bounds of the component. It can be prevented by calling event.preventDefault.
events.description_zh: 当指针事件发生在组件边界之外时调用的事件处理程序。可以通过调用 event.preventDefault 来防止它。

events.name: focusOutside
events.description: Event handler called when focus moves outside the bounds of the component. It can be prevented by calling event.preventDefault.
events.description_zh: 当焦点移出组件边界时调用的事件处理程序。可以通过调用 event.preventDefault 来防止它。

events.name: interactOutside
events.description: Event handler called when an interaction (pointer or focus event) happens outside the bounds of the component. It can be prevented by calling event.preventDefault.
events.description_zh: 当交互（指针或焦点事件）发生在组件边界之外时调用的事件处理程序。可以通过调用 event.preventDefault 来防止它。
